companyDescription: Telenor banka is a part of Telenor Group,  with 179 million users and present on 13 markets − in Scandinavia (Norway,  Sweden and Denmark),  Central and East Europe (Hungary,  Serbia,  Montenegro and Bulgaria) and Asia (Thailand,  Malaysia,  Bangladesh,  Pakistan,  Myanmar and India).
